introduction.title: Welcome
introduction.heroText: Fun Things to Do When Bored To Help You Stay Sane. So, when it feels like the seconds are just dragging on, in this app you can find fun things to do when you’re bored!

alertDialog.clearStorageBody: Application settings have been reset successfully.
alertDialog.emptyInternetBody: Your internet connection is down. Please fix it and then you can continue using Github App!

settings.appearanceHero: In this area you can customize the appearance of the application.
settings.appearanceText: Current appearance uses system settings when you do not make any changes.
settings.clearStorageText: You will also reset the notes you use in the application.
